com.here.msdkui.routing

Class WaypointList

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
          • com.here.msdkui.routing.WaypointList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, androidx.core.view.NestedScrollingChild, androidx.core.view.NestedScrollingChild2, androidx.core.view.ScrollingView

    public class WaypointList
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
    A view that shows a list of WaypointEntry items. By default, the list contains two empty items. Dragging and removing of items is supported via dedicated buttons. By default, removing items is only available when the list contains more than two items.

      static interface  WaypointList.Listener
      An interface for a listener to get notified on user interactions with this list.

        Throws:

        public void setVisibleNumberOfWaypointItems(int count)
        Sets the number of WaypointItem that should be visible without scrolling. The visible area of the list will be expanded to match this number. Items above that number will require scrolling.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • reset

        public void reset()
